text_block_list.text:
On the way back from going out with Matikanetannhauser――
She stopped in front of a certain clothing store.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Wow~! I've struck a vein!
It's a hat sale, a hat sale!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
I have plenty of allowance right now,
so let's definitely take a peek in here!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
No, no, this one is still going strong!
Hehehe, what I want to buy is~――

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Ta-da, bam!
Surprise! It's a hat for you!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Huh, a lukewarm reaction!?
Why? Hats are amazing, you know!?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
For example, they're stylish and cute!
Or they help you out in a pinch!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Hmm. You're doubting me?
Ahem, then I must tell you.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: The legend of my――first hat.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
――The first time I got a hat was,
well... right after I started elementary school.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
We were together wherever I went. Even when I
rode the train alone, or when I woke up at the
hour of the ox to use the toilet, with it, I was fine.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
But... the time for parting
came suddenly.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
That unforgettable day.
――Our family had come to play
at the forest park together.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
That day, I got too excited and ended up
getting lost in the vast park.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
A path with no people, growing darker...
But my heart didn't break.
Because... my hat (the first one) was with me.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
But! A heartless gust of wind blew...
And even my hat, my last emotional support,
was carried away!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
However... that was exactly
the miracle my hat (the first one) performed.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
The hat soared high into the sky――and amazingly,
it flew toward where my parents were!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
And my parents, sensing my location from the
direction the hat came from, were able to reunite
with me safely... and they all lived happily ever after.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
...But, the hat that flew away,
after searching and searching,
was never found again.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Surely, my hat became a substitute for me when I got lost.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: And so! That's how hats have mysterious power! That's the idea!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: So, you'll be safe if you wear a hat too! For example, even if you get lost, I can find you!
choice_data_list: Then I'll take one good one, please.
Then I'll ask for one good one, please.
I'll feel safe even if you get lost again.
You'll be safe even if you get lost again.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Mufufu, leave it to me. I'm a pro at choosing hats, no less! I've recommended hats to all sorts of people!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: To friends, relatives' kids, umm, and then, the elderly neighbors and such! I'm a veteran!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Now, let's take a look! Starting with this newsboy cap——
And so, while watching Matikanetannhauser browse through various hats with a smile, the two of them selected a hat.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: No, no~. I definitely won't get lost anymore, and my hat won't fly away either.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Because now, I set it firmly through my ears like this——
But at that moment, a strong wind suddenly blew——

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Whaaat!? W-wait~! Hat-chan!!
Matikanetannhauser chased after the hat and dashed off in an instant... A phone call came tens of minutes later.
It said——she got lost, so please come pick her up.
